klexdatr
  • Reference
  • News

Kootenay Lake Exploitation Study Data

Data from the Kootenay Lake Large Trout Exploitation Study.

Details

For a list of the available data sets type data(package = "klexdatr").

For information on a particular dataset type ?dataset.

All spatial coordinates are for UTM Zone 11U, i.e., EPSG: 26911, and all times are in Pacific Standard, i.e. Etc/GMT+8.

Examples

library(dplyr) # so tbl data frames print nice

print(klexdatr::section)
#> # A tibble: 33 x 5
#>    Section Habitat Bounded EastingSection NorthingSection
#>  *  <fctr>  <fctr>   <lgl>          <dbl>           <dbl>
#>  1     S03  Lentic    TRUE       469091.4         5603774
#>  2     S02   Lotic    TRUE       480563.8         5595333
#>  3     S04  Lentic    TRUE       502869.0         5585727
#>  4     S01   Lotic    TRUE       494545.9         5580270
#>  5     S05   Lotic    TRUE       503461.2         5566212
#>  6     S06   Lotic    TRUE       503599.0         5561065
#>  7     S07  Lentic    TRUE       504379.6         5556931
#>  8     S08  Lentic    TRUE       505733.3         5550877
#>  9     S09  Lentic    TRUE       507685.1         5545409
#> 10     S10  Lentic    TRUE       507829.3         5542442
#> # ... with 23 more rows
print(klexdatr::station)

#>                        Station Section EastingStation NorthingStation

#>  3              Gerrard Bridge     S02       480380.0         5595360
